title: Investigating the Electrochemical Performance of Maleic Anhydride-Tuned Cellulose Nanocrystals and Single-Wall Carbon Nanosheet Hybrids for Supercapacitor Applications
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00286E, Paper
Nitesh Choudhary, Shiva Singh, Gaurav Malik, Shakshi Bhardwaj, Siddharth Sharma, Akshay Tomar, Sheetal Issar, Ramesh Chandra, Pradip Kumar Maji
Creating supercapacitor electrodes using environmentally friendly, sustainable, and renewable materials is crucial for adopting a green and eco-conscious strategy. Chemically stable and renewable cellulose-based supercapacitors need high-quality carbon materials with...
